bot_config {"Rand": 3}
join hortbot 999 foobar 1


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!list addb mylist
send_any

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!command add test Here's your item: (_LIST_mylist_RANDOM_)
send_any


handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :!test
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Here's your item:

send_any
